00028 namespace MathNet.Numerics.Distributions

00048         public class InvCumulativeNormalDistribution : IRealFunction
00049         {
00050                 #region Coefficients in rational approximations
00051 
00052                 private static double[] a = {-3.969683028665376e+01, 2.209460984245205e+02,
00053                                                  -2.759285104469687e+02, 1.383577518672690e+02,
00054                                                  -3.066479806614716e+01, 2.506628277459239e+00};
00055 
00056                 private static double[] b = {-5.447609879822406e+01, 1.615858368580409e+02,
00057                                                  -1.556989798598866e+02, 6.680131188771972e+01, -1.328068155288572e+01};
00058 
00059                 private static double[] c = {-7.784894002430293e-03, -3.223964580411365e-01,
00060                                                  -2.400758277161838e+00, -2.549732539343734e+00,
00061                                                  4.374664141464968e+00, 2.938163982698783e+00};
00062 
00063                 private static double[] d = {7.784695709041462e-03, 3.224671290700398e-01,
00064                                                  2.445134137142996e+00, 3.754408661907416e+00};
00065 
00066                 #endregion
00067 
00068                 private double mean;
00069                 private double sigma;
00070 
00074                 public InvCumulativeNormalDistribution()
00075                 {
00076                         this.mean = 0d;
00077                         this.sigma = 1d;
00078                 }
00079 
00083                 public InvCumulativeNormalDistribution(double mean, double sigma)
00084                 {
00085                         this.mean = mean;
00086                         this.sigma = sigma;
00087                 }
00088 
00090                 public double Mean
00091                 {
00092                         get { return mean; }
00093                         set { mean = value; }
00094                 }
00095 
00099                 public double Sigma
00100                 {
00101                         get { return sigma; }
00102                         set { sigma = value; }
00103                 }
00104 
00109                 public double ValueOf(double p)
00110                 {
00111                         return mean + sigma * StandardValueOf(p);
00112                 }
00113 
00116                 private double StandardValueOf(double p)
00117                 {
00118                         if(p < 0.0 || p > 1.0) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException(
00119                                 "p", p, "The probability must be comprised in [0, 1].");
00120 
00121                         // Define break-points.
00122                         double plow = 0.02425;
00123                         double phigh = 1 - plow;
00124 
00125                         double q;
00126 
00127                         // Rational approximation for lower region:
00128                         if ( p < plow ) 
00129                         {
00130                                 q = Math.Sqrt(-2*Math.Log(p));
00131                                 return (((((c[0]*q+c[1])*q+c[2])*q+c[3])*q+c[4])*q+c[5]) /
00132                                         ((((d[0]*q+d[1])*q+d[2])*q+d[3])*q+1);
00133                         }
00134 
00135                         // Rational approximation for upper region:
00136                         if ( phigh < p ) 
00137                         {
00138                                 q = Math.Sqrt(-2*Math.Log(1-p));
00139                                 return -(((((c[0]*q+c[1])*q+c[2])*q+c[3])*q+c[4])*q+c[5]) /
00140                                         ((((d[0]*q+d[1])*q+d[2])*q+d[3])*q+1);
00141                         }
00142 
00143                         // Rational approximation for central region:
00144                         q = p - 0.5;
00145                         double r = q*q;
00146                         return (((((a[0]*r+a[1])*r+a[2])*r+a[3])*r+a[4])*r+a[5])*q /
00147                                 (((((b[0]*r+b[1])*r+b[2])*r+b[3])*r+b[4])*r+1);
00148                 }
00149
